name: Series
description: Properties of an event series that recurs over a period of time

fields.name: description
fields.description: A human-readable description of the series

fields.name: endDate
fields.description: An ISO date in the form `YYYY-MM-DD` or `2011-12-03`

fields.name: monthlyRecurrence
fields.description: Returned for events that are part of a monthly recurring series of events

fields.name: weeklyRecurrence
fields.description: Returned for events that are part of a weekly recurring series of events
